name: Void Prospect
description:
Dodge asteroids and collect gold using your dependable Element-Discerning Gravity Hook. But be careful not to overheat.

  • Controls
    • Left/Right Arrows - Move
    • Z - Shoot laser
    • X - Hold to activate gold hook

Void Prospect is an entry for LOWREZJAM 2021. It doesn't quite fit any of the optional themes, but I could make the case for "Gravity Is the Enemy"; if you're not careful, the gold hook will slingshot your quarry out into space. More like, "Gravity is the double-edged sword." Close enough.

Thanks for playing!

Note: You may experience some audio distortion if playing in Chrome. This is a known issue (https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/47453). It sounds fine in Firefox.
